summary: The Ursine Armor Pack UNP converted to 7B.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#cc0000]NB! if you find it unrealistic that i used the Cleavage body, yiu're in luxk, since i'm planning to remake it with the Bombshell body when I get the time.[/color][url=http://postimage.org/][color=#cc0000]
[/color]
[img]http://s25.postimg.org/xauueb01b/tips.jpg[/img][/url]

For now i didn't convert the Stormcloak scarf, that may come later :P
Clipping may be a small problem when running and in certain poses.

[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s25.postimg.org/v50jjswkv/installation.jpg[/img][/url]

First make sure you have a Sevenbase body with a propper skeleton for it. If you haven't
get it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]Here[/url].
and then install an compatible skeleton like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]this one[/url].
Then download and Install the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/]Ursine Armor Pack UNP[/url].
Then install this, overwrite everything. Using either Mod Organizer, NMM or manuall install method.

[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s25.postimg.org/7hzkvor8v/videos.jpg[/img][/url]

Coming Soon...

[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s25.postimg.org/ank6lw9v3/thanks.jpg[/img][/url]

nsk13/Deserted X for the awesome clothing and giving me permission to release it.
mkenny95 for support, testing and screenshots.
NeonFirefly for mod idea, support, testing and screenshots.[/center]
author: Robton
